title: OS Level 9 â€” Virtual Memory & Page Replacement
concept: MCQs on virtual memory, page faults and page replacement algorithms.

challenges.title: Q1: Virtual Memory
challenges.description: Virtual memory is a technique that:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Uses only RAM for execution
b) Allows execution of processes that may not be completely in memory
c) Avoids use of secondary storage
d) Eliminates need for page replacement
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d

challenges.title: Q2: Page Replacement Algorithm
challenges.description: Which of the following is a page replacement algorithm?
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) FCFS
b) Round Robin
c) LRU
d) Multilevel Queue
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d
